title: 20min+ queue times - wood league
body:
I understand players in higher elo have some crazy queue times seems this has now filtered down to bronze / silver
I mean three +-20min queues in a row on a Saturday seems crazy
watched a video the other day from riot claiming they were looking at this, if anything it's getting worse
I am sure most people have spent both time and money playing LoL for a while and as its gotten bigger riot has taken less and less community feedback on board. I get that e-sports is a big focus but lets also remember all the people who made this game as big as it is.
Maybe lets at least try fixing things for players of all levels before we make new drakes.

replies.body:
Did you ever think they might be doing some on the fly testing?

Keep in mind the same people who work on ranked matchmaking system and those who are working on new content are separate from each others work output.

One team works on new content while another team tries to find new ways of sorting out ranked queue times.

The fact that you did end up with big queue times can either mean coincidence or testing, both of which is not a negative on Riot's part.
